summary_detail.value: Due to high temperatures and record low humidity the incident weather forecast is calling for potential extreme fire behavior today anticipating rapid transition from creeping/smoldering to torching and wind driven runs. As a result of the weather forecast Ravalli County Sheriff has issued an Evacuation Order for all residents west of Highway 93 from the north side of Bass Creek Road, north to the intersection of Hannaford Avenue and Florence Carlton Loop are ordered to evacuate. Evacuation Warnings are in effect for residents west of Highway 93 from Bass Creek Road to West County Line Road.  All evacuated residents are asked to check in at the Ravalli County Search and Rescue Command Van located at the Stevensville Super One parking lot. A Red Cross Evacuation Center is opening at the LDS Church in Stevensville. If residents leave too late the visibility may be worse causing issues. Please contact the local humane society for assistance with pets.Ravalli County Sheriff 406-375-6650
